Articles.Content:
So I've been thinking, since the Kraken is such a big thing, why don't we have a day dedicated to it. I'm trying to come up with a date to have it on, and so far I have:

September 19th (They day the deep space Kraken was slain)

April 23rd (The day that Danny2462, a known servant of the Kraken, created his channel)

If you have any other dates, please suggest them.
February 29th, both because we want Kraken Day to be rare (so as to avoid luring it out) and because leap days are a common cause of mistakes in crappy time-handling code.
I don't know about a date, but I know what I'll be drinkin!

I don't know about a date, but I know what I'll be drinkin!

http://nebula.wsimg.com/822187d750c8ea67ebcb61138ad596fe?AccessKeyId=46E1086E2291C9D34B0D&disposition=0&alloworigin=1

That image is so great...

Danny2462 is no servant of the Kraken.

The Kraken is Danny2462's pet.

September 19th, the day the Kraken was slain!

By insane coincidence, that's also Talk Like a Pirate Day!

Danny2462 is no servant of the Kraken.

The Kraken is Danny2462's pet.

Definetely, since he summons him at will.

September 19th, the day the Kraken was slain!

By insane coincidence, that's also Talk Like a Pirate Day!

+1........
When was the Great Forum Crash again? Some time in April 2013? I would say it was a sign of the Kraken.

What about the date the first kraken drive was made (the egg device)...

Otherwise I'm for when Danny created his channel....
I'm going for April 23rd, when the great Danny hath cometh forth upon these lands.
The FTL egg is definitely not a Kraken drive. I believe it is a very light Kerbal-ladder drive, in the neighborhood of 10 kg.
The day the great forum disappearing magic act happened.

Well considering September 19th is my birthday... I'm choosing that .

Also if the kraken was slain on the 19th, and I was born on the 19th, does that make me the Avatar of Krakens?!?!

Day? Oh, no, no.

The Kraken owns the night. Every night. And in space, it's always night, because the Kraken said so.

In space, no can hear you scream... as the Kraken destroys the very concept of sound when he attacks.

Plus, it's like, um, a vacuum. Well not technically.
February 29th is inarguably the best option

September 19th, the day the Kraken was slain!

By insane coincidence, that's also Talk Like a Pirate Day!

Arrrr I forgot about that!

I think it should be February the 29th, just because that will probably be the unluckiest day of the year, so i'll be glad that it happens less...

Day? Oh, no, no.

The Kraken owns the night. Every night. And in space, it's always night, because the Kraken said so.

Wait, it's night in space? Does that mean we can land on the sun now???

Wait, it's night in space? Does that mean we can land on the sun now???

Really? You didn't even know? The North Koreans have already landed there!
I vote for 1 November, the day my divorce from the Kraken was final .

I say Sept. 19, and not just because of the convenient coincidence. :-D

Plus, on that day, if you speak of the Kraken, everyone will figure it fits in, but the KSPers will *know*.

Day? Oh, no, no.

The Kraken owns the night. Every night. And in space, it's always night, because the Kraken said so.

For the night is dark and full of errors.
The day... the great april wipe? I forgot when it was
I watched a few of danny's videos. they are terrible and he is not worthy of a day.

The day... the great april wipe? I forgot when it was

oh god that was a full 3 weeks...
